ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Sky
ygData.msgSnippet: heh it would be the only explanation for the statement that PoS items make other high-end stuff look like rusty longswords, though i agree it is fishy at best.
ygData.messageBody:
heh it would be the only explanation for the statement that PoS items make
other high-end stuff look like rusty longswords, though i agree it is fishy
at best. maybe not a skill, but wearing that crap should give you some
benefit you maybe aren't aware of on the surface, otherwise why bother with
any of it.

Shada


> Sounds fishy, since VI has stated it the past that no items
> would boost
> skills in the that matter.
> I believe they answered that when Gordon was asked if
> mechanical lockpicks
> added anything to the lock pick skill and his answer was no
> and no items in
> the game would add to a skill.
>
> Rokenn
